name: Dushlan
summary:
No, this isn’t your typical block stacker. This is better. This is Dúshlán*. Dúshlán flips Tetris on its blocky head with new twists on a fundamental classic. 
 
NEW FEATURES AND CHALLENGES 
- Brand New, All Original Shapes 
- Upside Down Levels 
- Rising Floors 
- Block Save and Swap System 
- Horizontal Attacks 
 
Brought to the NES in collaboration with the ever-talented Peter McQuillan.
